com.sk89q.worldedit.regions

Class CuboidRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk89q.worldedit.regions.AbstractRegion
      • com.sk89q.worldedit.regions.CuboidRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlatRegion, Region, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<BlockVector>

    public class CuboidRegion
extends AbstractRegion
implements FlatRegion
    An axis-aligned cuboid. It can be defined using two corners of the cuboid.
